release.action: Added automatic upload of ZOS sources to mainframe to help with distribution of ZOS artifacts.
Documentation update to cross reference the new distribution-zos project.
Uses new naming convention for LegStar messaging classes.

The payload is now built from the serialization of potentially multiple inputs. This was added to support CICS containers. A CICS container-driven program can handle multiple input and multiple output structures.
First version of the socket connectivity.
